acceptanceCriteria: ML model predicts token usage per project
Context exhaustion predictions accurate to 5 minutes
Session pattern analysis identifies usage trends
notes: Implemented predictive analytics using simple statistical models (linear regression, moving averages) that work without ML libraries. The module integrates with GlobalContextTracker for real-time data and provides exhaustion predictions, cost recommendations, and pattern analysis. API endpoints added: /api/predictions, /api/recommendations, /api/patterns/:id
